title: BRIEF-Xiaomi Corp India Exec Says Plans To Up Local Retail Store Presence To 10,000 By Mid-2020
text:
BRIEF-Xiaomi Corp India Exec Says Plans To Up Local Retail Store Presence To 10,000 By Mid-2020

Stock Markets 21 minutes ago (Oct 14, 2019 16:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Xiaomi Corp India Exec Says Plans To Up Local Retail Store Presence To 10,000 By Mid-2020 Oct 14 (Reuters) - Xiaomi Corp India Exec Manu Jain : * XIAOMI CORP INDIA EXEC SAYS PLANS TO UP LOCAL RETAIL STORE PRESENCE TO 10,000 BY MID-2020 * XIAOMI CORP INDIA EXEC SAYS CURRENT STORE PRESENCE AT 6,000 PLUS Further company coverage: 1810.HK

BRIEF-Xiaomi Corp India Exec Says Plans To Up Local Retail Store Presence To 10,000 By Mid-2020
